summary: Law student at King Saud University in the final semester with a GPA of 4.50/5 and recipient of Second-Class Honors. Interested in law and gained practical experience through training at leading law firms and a governmental center. Also contributed to organizing legal events, managing student projects, and supporting legal and commercial operations in private businesses. Seeking a cooperative training opportunity in 2026 to enhance practical experience and build a strong career in law.

experiences.title: Trainee Legal Advisor (Contract)
bullets: Conducted legal due diligence for corporate entities, drafted agreements, and reviewed contracts.
Prepared legal research and communicated with clients to clarify regulatory aspects.

experiences.title: Sales Representative
bullets: Managed daily sales operations and oversaw business processes, including legal-related matters of the establishment.
Developed business relationships and ensured client satisfaction.

experiences.title: Summer Legal Internship
bullets: Contributed to contract drafting and preparation of legal memoranda and pleadings.

experiences.title: Legal Internship
bullets: Conducted legal research, analyzed cases, and supported governance framework development and contract drafting.

experiences.title: Legal Internship (Job Shadowing)
bullets: Monitored daily regulatory procedures and participated in practical legal simulations.

experiences.title: Summer Internship
bullets: Examined commercial cases, prepared legal memoranda, and gained exposure to litigation practices.

certifications.title: Certificate of Completion: Principles of Artificial Intelligence
Legal English Workshop
certifications.provider: Above & Beyond Team in collaboration with Khushaim & Partners and Al Faisal University

projects.title: Kiffah Legal Forum
projects.description: A student-led legal forum aimed at enhancing legal awareness through specialized workshops and engagement with legal entities.
bullets: Directed the project, coordinated with participating entities, and supervised event preparations and workshop organization in collaboration with the Law Students team.
